description: Detects the use of a Visual Studio bundled tool named DumpMinitool.exe Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: DumpMinitool Usage
query: (process.executable:*\\DumpMinitool.exe OR OriginalName:"DumpMinitool.exe" OR (process.command_line:*\ \-\-processId\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-\-dumpType\ Full*))
